item.description:
Please RSVP so that we can make reservations. After lunch - we will go to Big City to shoot some pool to burn off some calories. Big City is at 138 Brighton Ave - a short walk from Shabu Zen. If you want to join us for pool only - please indicate so when RSVP'ing. For pool only - we will probably meet there at 2 or 2:30 pm depending on what time we finish lunch.

There is free parking in the back of Shabu Zen. By T - take Green Line B train to Packards Corner (across from super 88). Walk 3-4 blocks up Brighton Ave to Shabu Zen.


check out Shabu Zen's website for menu and prices.

http://www.shabuzen.c...

FYI - if you do rsvp as "maybe", please update your rsvp prior to the event.

Hope you see you there.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the front waiting area. If you arrive asian time, please ask the host where we are seated.
item.why: It's cold outside and there's no better way to warm up than with asian hot pot. It's a healthy, delicious, do it yourself meal. And there's no football game to watch that day. The undefeated Patriots will be playing the week after in the Superbowl!!

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Hot Pot & Billiards
